title: Blade
description: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of humans against vampires.

title: Blade II
description: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with vampire hunters to combat a new breed of mutant vampires.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club with surprising consequences.

title: Mad Max
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a vengeful cop sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At Worlds End
description: Captain Jack Sparrow and his crew face their greatest challenges in a battle for freedom on the high seas.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Mans Chest
description: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid eternal servitude.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
description: Jack Sparrow searches for the legendary Fountain of Youth and confronts old enemies.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
description: A blacksmith teams up with a pirate to save the governors daughter from cursed pirates.

title: Rambo
description: A former soldier must rescue a group of missionaries taken hostage in war-torn Burma.

title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
description: A reporter and a pilot team up to save the world from a mysterious robot invasion.

title: Skyfall
description: James Bond investigates an attack on MI6 and confronts a mysterious villain from his past.

title: Tenet
description: A secret agent manipulates time to prevent World War III.

title: Terminator
description: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill the mother of a future resistance leader.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A reprogrammed terminator protects a young boy from a more advanced assassin.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, a stockbroker who rose to prominence through crime and corruption.
